name: Aria
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
text2: Happy birthday to you again, i hope this letter receiveed by you or read by only you,okay simulan ko na i knoww na marami taon na tayo magkaibigan  sana magpatuloy toh kahit minsan madami ka problema i know na kaya mo lagpasan yan always remember na nandito ako palagi sayo sumusuporta sayo sa malayo, wag ka muna magbf aba bbbata kapa HAHAHAH, jokee matandakana nasasayo'yan kung gusto mo basta susupoortahan kita kahit ano manyare lahat ng sitwasyon may dahilan kaya kailangan mo lagpasan,nandito ako palagi sayo para ssupportahan ka, and pasensya if yung ugali ko gannon if naglalaro tayo wwell pinapakita ko talaga ssyo yung ugali ko na yon chinecheck ko kung kaya moko e handle pero for me parang hindi, so yung ugali na  yon is parang experience  langk  kaya sorry kung kinokoompare kita hehehe, salamt nakikipaglaro kaparin sakin, once again happy birthday and gooodluckkk to your nxt chapter!
text3: wag  kka susuko  palagi mo tandaan nasa tabi moko para supportahan kita
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
